text: An la jue bu qingshi yi wenzi huo bi wen zi geng xiao de dongxi she biyu. Zhiyu xinshimen, tamen zhidao na shi cong tamen de zhu [an la] jiang shi de zhenli. Zhiyu buxinyang zhe, tamen shuo:“An la she zhege biyu de zhiyi shi shenme ne?” Ta [an la] yi ci shi xuduo ren mi wu, ye yi ci yindao xuduo ren zunxing zhengdao, dan ta zhi yi ci shi beini zhe mi wu.
